original_text: When he came out, he could not speak to them. They realized he had seen a vision in the temple, for he kept making signs to them but remained unable to speak.
korean_text: 그가 나와서 그들에게 말을 못하니 백성들이 그가 성전 안에서 환상을 본 줄 알았더라 그가 몸짓으로 뜻을 표시하며 그냥 말 못하는 대로 있더니

sentences.original_text: he could not speak to them
They realized he had seen a vision
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 이상을 보았다는 것을 깨달았다

sentences.original_text: for he kept making signs to them
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 그들에게 계속 손짓했기 때문이다
